restaurants.notables: The most expensive tacos on the menu are $3 and it's nearly walking distance, so no excuses if it's light out.
Most of the menu is under $15 and it's BYOB.
If we split the enchiladas and don't drink mezcal or only do takeout it's quite cheap.

restaurants.sampleitems: Biriyani, but also so many curries.
restaurants.notables: Everything is under $14.

restaurants.sampleitems: The steak salad with kale is always good plus they have great specials.
restaurants.notables: Usually two salads are under $30 for takeout.

restaurants.sampleitems: Fish curry and that eggplant dish that tastes even better next day. Plus so many other things we have not even tried.
restaurants.notables: Everything is under $14.
How has this not been a thing yet? Even if it's not good there are fish tacos on the way back. But it's probably good.
Sure it's a drive, but for a cheap and brilliant meal.
Cheap and Tasty

restaurants.sampleitems: XLB, Cumin Lamb, Fish in Chili Oil, Spicy Wontons
restaurants.notables: So worth the headache of a drive every time and a cheap meal at that.
For around the same price you can get insanely good noodles and pick based on which is less crowded or what you need most.

A simple, healthy solution for lunch or dinner

This can go from affordable to not really fast with mezcal but it's one of the more worth it choices

Every time you go here it's always way cheaper than you thought it was going to be
Nearby and often makes for excellent leftovers
Well reviewed affordable pho restaurant in Chinatown near cute wine bar
It's so close just do it

restaurants.sampleitems: Ramen and other great Japanese favorites

You know you want it

restaurants.sampleitems: You can get their cafe items or bring some deli items home for a romantic meal
